description: This file implements authentication API endpoints using FastAPI, including login, token refresh, and Google OAuth sign-in. It defines route handlers, helper functions, and interacts with database models and external services.

methods.name: AuthResponse _build_auth_response(user: User, access: str, refresh: str)
methods.description: Helper function to construct an AuthResponse object with user info and tokens.

methods.name: AuthResponse login(payload: LoginRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Authenticates a user using email and password, returns token pair.

methods.name: AuthResponse refresh_tokens(payload: RefreshRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Refreshes authentication tokens using a valid refresh token.

methods.name: AuthResponse google_sign_in(payload: GoogleLoginRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Authenticates or registers a user via Google ID token.
